com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features

Class ParserFeatureParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.AbstractFeatureParser<ParseConfigurationWrapper>
      • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features.ParserFeatureParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureClassContainer, FeatureParser<ParseConfigurationWrapper>, FeatureParserInternal<ParseConfigurationWrapper>

    public class ParserFeatureParser
extends AbstractFeatureParser<ParseConfigurationWrapper>
    The central class for parsing a descriptor containing parser features.
    The list of available features is given in addFeatureClasses(FeatureClassContainer).
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.AbstractFeatureParser

      • getModifiedDescriptors

        public java.util.List<FunctionDescriptor> getModifiedDescriptors(FunctionDescriptor functionDescriptor)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFeatureParser
        Given a feature descriptor, converts it into multiple feature descriptors if required, for example when generating a separate feature for each pos-tag, or for an whole range of indexes. Should return a List containing the initial function descriptor if no modification is required.
        Specified by:
        getModifiedDescriptors in class AbstractFeatureParser<ParseConfigurationWrapper>
